++*Katya*
Katya is slim, with that half-starved look many of the girls had. She is barely fifteen. Her hair is mousy brown and roughly shoulder length. Her eyes are blue. She is generally quiet, given to reflection.
She and [Danila] are best friends, behave like sisters, and are sometimes lovers.
